lead_paragraph: LANG--Wesley W.,of Stamford, CT died on April 11, 2016 at the age of 95. Born March 17, 1921 in New York, son of Otto and Catherine Lang and educated at Richmond Hill High (Queens, LI), Columbia University (B.A.), and NYU (M.B.A.). He served in the United States Army Air Force in WWII. Thereafter, he was employed by A.D. Julliard, Pfizer Inc., Schrafft's and B. Altman & Co where he served as CFO and as a member of the board of directors. He is survived by Marion Lang (his wife of 69 years); their daughter Nancy of New York City; two sons, Wesley Jr. married to Mary Margaret (Gillin) of Palm Beach FL and their four daughters - Pamela married to Christopher (Golding), Emily, Jennifer and Elise; and Kenneth, married to Deborah (Van Bemmelen) and their two daughters Kathryn and Julia of Darien, CT. A private service will be held at Noroton Presbyterian Church in Darien, CT and a private interment in Naples, FL. In lieu of flowers, donations in Wesley's name are suggested to the charity of your choice or St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. www. lawrencefuneralhome.com. 1/3
